parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The **token** can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [Ensure idempotence](~~25693~~).

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.Description` to specify the description of security group rule N.

parameters.name: DestCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.DestCidrIp` to specify the destination IPv4 CIDR block.

parameters.name: DestGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.DestGroupId` to specify the ID of the destination security group.

parameters.name: DestGroupOwnerAccount
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.DestGroupOwnerAccount` to specify the Alibaba Cloud account that manages the destination security group.

parameters.name: DestGroupOwnerId
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.DestGroupOwnerId` to specify the ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that manages the destination security group.

parameters.name: DestPrefixListId
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.DestPrefixListId` to specify the ID of the destination prefix list.

parameters.name: IpProtocol
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.IpProtocol` to specify the protocol.

parameters.name: Ipv6DestCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.Ipv6DestCidrIp` to specify the destination IPv6 CIDR block.

parameters.name: Ipv6SourceCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.Ipv6SourceCidrIp` to specify the source IPv6 CIDR block.

parameters.name: NicType
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.NicType` to specify the NIC type.

parameters.name: Permissions
parameters.description: An array of security group rules. You can specify 1 to 100 security group rules.

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.Policy` to specify whether to allow outbound access.

parameters.name: PortRange
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.PortRange` to specify the range of destination ports.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.Priority` to specify the rule priority.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the source security group. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SourceCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.SourceCidrIp` to specify the source IPv4 CIDR block.

parameters.name: SourcePortRange
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use `Permissions.N.SourcePortRange` to specify the range of source ports.
